name: amasty/module-order-attributes-subscription-package
description: Order Attributes Subscription Package by Amasty

suggest.amasty/module-orderattr-hyva-compatibili: Install this package to ensure Amasty Order Attributes extension works with Hyvä Theme.
suggest.amasty/module-orderattr-hyva-checkout-co: Install this package to ensure Amasty Order Attributes extension works with Hyvä Checkout.
suggest.amasty/module-orderattr-graphql: Install this package to ensure Amasty Order Attributes extension works with GraphQl.
